site_name: Monken Hadley Common, Hadley Common, Barnet, EN5
description: Removal of conditions 6 (Ecological Mitigation Measures), 7 (Onsite Ecologist), 8 (Invasive Species Management Plan) and 9 (Details of Retention of Large Diameter Timber) of planning permission reference 23/4958/FUL dated 14/06/2024 for 'Excavation of wetland basin, flood storage area and bund within Monken Hadley Common, including a diversion of a surface water sewer from Parkgate Avenue into Monken Hadley Common and footpath improvementworks.' Variation to include removal of conditions 6, 7, 8 and 9 and replace with new condition relating to CEMP (Construction Environmental Management Plan: Biodiversity)
